name: Charades
description: Charades is a game where you have to guess the word that is being acted out by the other player.
rules: The player who is acting out the word is not allowed to speak or make any sounds.
The player who is acting out the word is not allowed to use any props or gestures.
The player who is acting out the word is not allowed to use any letters or numbers.
The player who is acting out the word is not allowed to use any words that are not in the dictionary.
